--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

As Lynxiz makes her way to the exit of the Chivitron base, she 
notices that the fighting appears to have stopped. Opening the 
door, she leaps out, and lands on the ground in a crouch. "Hmm," 
she says to herself, "I think that the base has been sucessfully 
defended. She'd though that they would be slag after this was 
finished...

Axis, still hiding behind his pod, sees Lynxiz as she leaps out of 
the ship. Hearing her words, he fills her in quite briefly, "Uhh, hi 
Lynxiz, the attackers finally decided to retreat, so I guess it looks 
like we've won this fight!" He smiles.

Lynxiz nods returning the smile, "Where is Windlord?" She'd seen 
Aerotaur being pulled into the CR chamber by Nightlight not long 
ago.

Axis frowns, "I don't know." He peeks over top of his pod to look for 
the bot. (Airly, is Windlord there?)

Lokk sighs in relief as he starts down from the mountain with 
quickly feet. He gets to the bottom, and starts heading for the base.

ooC: Lynxiz was heading out of the base, and now she is outside 
of the base. =)
